result.execSummary:
The defendant David D Fletcher was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possession of THC (2nd+ Offense), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Resisting or Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant David D Fletcher in court with attorney Helmi Hamad.  Defendant David D Fletcher in custody.  Noah Michael Wishau appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.
Defense requests bond modification. State does not object. 
BTC: Bond modification is granted. Bond is modified to a $2000.00 co-signature bond w/Lisa Sullivan DOB 2/14/71. No contact with the co-defendant, TD.   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant  NOT consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances.   Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) to monitor - report to 524 S Main Street, Third Floor (262-632-1780).   Defendant to be placed on GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI), 524 Main Street, 3rd floor, (262-632-1780). Exceptions are going to court, meeting w/his Atty and medical appointments.   Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on April 29, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:    It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant David D Fletcher in court with attorney Sean Michael Brown.  Defendant David D Fletcher in custody.  W Richard Chiapete appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  
Defense would like it on the record that he would like bond reviewed at the preliminary hearing. 
Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 29, 2015 at 09:00 am.
